meta.name: Global ReSetÂ®
meta.heroTitle: Large Re-settable Manual Call Point for Global Use
meta.heroDescription: A re-settable UL fire alarm call point that simulates break glass activation with no broken glass. Versatile mounting plate fits to U.S., European (GLR models only), double-gang and single-gang mounting boxes, making it quick and easy to install. When activated an indicator drops into view. Simple reset with the provided key for immediate re-use. Housing is available in five colours for the fire alarm call point. Key-to-Reset DPDT with 2 Form C contacts. MOUNTING - Global Resets (GLR models only) are supplied as flush mount only. Back boxes are available for surface mount applications.
